name: Primitive (blueOkiris)
description:
Goal: Defeat all bosses to enable teleporter to go home to your wife, Eve.

Side-goal: Collect all the hidden treasures

Main Concept: Fight the bosses and enemies by defeating and ripping body parts off of animals to add to your own. Replace your man-punch with a fearsome lion strike, or stop jumping and dashing and start flying and swooping by taking control of the wings of an Eagle.

Controls:

Left/Right movement - L stick/Arrow keys

Jump - A button/Space

Dash/Roll - RB or RT/x key (note that you are invulnerable during the roll/dash)

Punch/Double Punch/Use ability - B button/Z key (note that if you punch quickly, you'll do two punches instead of one)

Take body part from Enemy - Y button/Ctrl

Drop current ability - D-Pad/Shift

I hope you enjoy!
